title: National Museum of Singapore Playground
blurb: Customised playground inspired by blue whale skeleton.
description: A Whale of a Tale is a customised playground inspired by the iconic blue whale skeleton once displayed at the National Museum of Singapore. This installation was built in collaboration with SPACELogic, blending artistry, storytelling, and safe play design into a remarkable interactive experience. The majestic Whale Structure, crafted from Glass Fibre Reinforced Concrete (GFRC) and equipped with a wide variety of play equipment that encourages exploration, imagination, and physical activity. Children can tunnel through the underside of the whale’s head or climb up using ladders, scale across the cargo net blowhole, and descend the slide that exits through the whale’s mouth. Mosaic tiles embellish the whale’s head and tail, while climbing grips—designed to resemble barnacles—offer tactile and visual appeal. Behind the head, interactive Galopin play panels and a steering wheel ignite imaginative adventures. The skeletal body of the whale offers additional fun elements such as swing seats, a spring seat, and a cargo net, promoting balance and coordination. Between the whale’s body and tail, children can navigate a series of balance beams and play mounds that test their agility. Music and movement intertwine through Percussion Play instruments, where children can experiment with rhythm by spinning the Cyclone—mimicking the gentle sound of rain—or striking the Djembe to produce varying tones. The Berliner Disk, tilted for dynamic spinning, enhances coordination and spatial awareness as children learn to balance through motion. Surrounding Outerspace outdoor picnic furniture set provides a welcoming area for rest and social connection.
Keyword_tag: Playground, National Museum, Children's Activities, Interactive Play, Outdoor Play

title: National Museum of Singapore
blurb: Explore Singapore's rich history and cultural heritage.
description: The National Museum of Singapore focuses on Singapore's history and culture. Its galleries feature exhibits on early Singapore, the colonial era, and modern Singapore. The museum also hosts various events and exhibitions throughout the year, making it a great place for families to learn about Singapore's past. Visitors can explore interactive displays and artifacts that showcase the nation's journey. The museum aims to provide an engaging and educational experience for all ages, fostering a deeper understanding of Singapore's identity and heritage. It is a family-friendly destination with activities suitable for children and adults alike.
Keyword_tag: Singapore history, cultural heritage, museum exhibits, family activities

title: Mandai Rainforest Resort
blurb: Experience nature at Mandai Rainforest Resort.
description: Mandai Rainforest Resort offers a unique nature-based experience. Nestled within the Mandai Wildlife Reserve, the resort provides guests with opportunities to connect with nature and wildlife. Visitors can enjoy guided nature walks, wildlife encounters, and educational programs. The resort aims to promote conservation and sustainability, offering a family-friendly environment where guests can learn about and appreciate the natural world. With its lush surroundings and diverse wildlife, Mandai Rainforest Resort is an ideal destination for families seeking an immersive nature experience. The resort provides a range of activities suitable for all ages, ensuring an engaging and educational visit.
Keyword_tag: Nature resort, wildlife, Mandai, family activities, conservation

title: Tengah Garden Court - Praying Mantis
blurb: Discover the Praying Mantis at Tengah Garden Court.
description: Tengah Garden Court features a Praying Mantis themed play area. This unique playground offers children a fun and engaging space to explore and play. The play structures are designed to resemble praying mantises, providing a creative and imaginative play environment. Families can enjoy spending time outdoors in this garden court, which is designed to promote physical activity and social interaction. The Praying Mantis theme adds an element of curiosity and learning, making it an educational and enjoyable experience for children of all ages. The garden court is a great place for families to relax and have fun together.
Keyword_tag: Playground, Praying Mantis, garden, outdoor play, family
